content: fasten_off mc attach color b next 4 row with color b repeat row 2 at end of fourth row fasten_off color b attach color a last 4 row with color a repeat row 2 fasten_off and weave in all tails copyright 2017 2009 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
